019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1SecretList;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.Watch.Response;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
030import java.security.SecureRandom;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.LinkedList;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Scanner;
037import java.util.logging.Level;
038import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
039import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1PodStub;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD;
045import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.GetDisplayPassword;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
050import org.jgrapes.core.CompletionLock;
051import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
052import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
053import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
054import org.jose4j.base64url.Base64;
055
056/**
057 * Watches for changes of display secrets.
058 */
059@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.TooManyStaticImports" })
060public class DisplaySecretMonitor
061        extends AbstractMonitor<V1Secret, V1SecretList, VmChannel> {
062
063    private int passwordValidity = 10;
064    private final List<PendingGet> pendingGets
065        = Collections.synchronizedList(new LinkedList<>());
066
067    /**
068     * Instantiates a new display secrets monitor.
069     *
070     * @param componentChannel the component channel
071     */
072    public DisplaySecretMonitor(Channel componentChannel) {
073        super(componentChannel, V1Secret.class, V1SecretList.class);
074        context(K8sV1SecretStub.CONTEXT);
075        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
076        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
077            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET);
078        options(options);
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * On configuration update.
083     *
084     * @param event the event
085     */
086    @Handler
087    @Override
088    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
089        super.onConfigurationUpdate(event);
090        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(c -> {
091            try {
092                if (c.containsKey("passwordValidity")) {
093                    passwordValidity = Integer
094                        .parseInt((String) c.get("passwordValidity"));
095                }
096            } catch (ClassCastException e) {
097                logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
098            }
099        });
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    protected void prepareMonitoring() throws IOException, ApiException {
104        client(new K8sClient());
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    protected void handleChange(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change) {
109        String vmName = change.object.getMetadata().getLabels()
110            .get("app.kubernetes.io/instance");
111        if (vmName == null) {
112            return;
113        }
114        var channel = channel(vmName).orElse(null);
115        if (channel == null || channel.vmDefinition() == null) {
116            return;
117        }
118
119        try {
120            patchPod(client, change);
121        } catch (ApiException e) {
122            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
123                () -> "Cannot patch pod annotations: " + e.getMessage());
124        }
125    }
126
127    private void patchPod(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change)
128            throws ApiException {
129        // Force update for pod
130        ListOptions listOpts = new ListOptions();
131        listOpts.setLabelSelector(
132            "app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=" + VM_OP_NAME + ","
133                + "app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
134                + "app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + change.object.getMetadata()
135                    .getLabels().get("app.kubernetes.io/instance"));
136        // Get pod, selected by label
137        var pods = K8sV1PodStub.list(client, namespace(), listOpts);
138
139        // If the VM is being created, the pod may not exist yet.
140        if (pods.isEmpty()) {
141            return;
142        }
143        var pod = pods.iterator().next();
144
145        // Patch pod annotation
146        PatchOptions patchOpts = new PatchOptions();
147        patchOpts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
148        pod.patch(V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
149            new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": "
150                + "\"/metadata/annotations/vmrunner.jdrupes.org~1dpVersion\", "
151                + "\"value\": \""
152                + change.object.getMetadata().getResourceVersion()
153                + "\"}]"),
154            patchOpts);
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * On get display secrets.
159     *
160     * @param event the event
161     * @param channel the channel
162     * @throws ApiException the api exception
163     */
164    @Handler
165    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
166    public void onGetDisplaySecrets(GetDisplayPassword event, VmChannel channel)
167            throws ApiException {
168        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
169        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
170            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
171            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance="
172            + event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName());
173        var stubs = K8sV1SecretStub.list(client(),
174            event.vmDefinition().metadata().getNamespace(), options);
175        if (stubs.isEmpty()) {
176            return;
177        }
178        var stub = stubs.iterator().next();
179
180        // Check validity
181        var model = stub.model().get();
182        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
183        var expiry = new String(model.getData().get(DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY));
184        if (model.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD) != null
185            && stillValid(expiry)) {
186            event.setResult(
187                new String(model.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD)));
188            return;
189        }
190        updatePassword(stub, event);
191    }
192
193    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
194    private void updatePassword(K8sV1SecretStub stub, GetDisplayPassword event)
195            throws ApiException {
196        SecureRandom random = null;
197        try {
198            random = SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong();
199        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) { // NOPMD
200            // "Every implementation of the Java platform is required
201            // to support at least one strong SecureRandom implementation."
202        }
203        byte[] bytes = new byte[16];
204        random.nextBytes(bytes);
205        var password = Base64.encode(bytes);
206        var model = stub.model().get();
207        model.setStringData(Map.of(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD, password,
208            DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY,
209            Long.toString(Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity)));
210        event.setResult(password);
211
212        // Prepare wait for confirmation (by VM status change)
213        var pending = new PendingGet(event,
214            event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial().orElse(0L) + 1,
215            new CompletionLock(event, 1500));
216        pendingGets.add(pending);
217        Event.onCompletion(event, e -> {
218            pendingGets.remove(pending);
219        });
220
221        // Update, will (eventually) trigger confirmation
222        stub.update(model).getObject();
223    }
224
225    private boolean stillValid(String expiry) {
226        if (expiry == null || "never".equals(expiry)) {
227            return true;
228        }
229        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CloseResource", "resource" })
230        var scanner = new Scanner(expiry);
231        if (!scanner.hasNextLong()) {
232            return false;
233        }
234        long expTime = scanner.nextLong();
235        return expTime > Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity;
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * On vm def changed.
240     *
241     * @param event the event
242     * @param channel the channel
243     */
244    @Handler
245    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, Channel channel) {
246        synchronized (pendingGets) {
247            String vmName = event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName();
248            for (var pending : pendingGets) {
249                if (pending.event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName()
250                    .equals(vmName)
251                    && event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial()
252                        .map(s -> s >= pending.expectedSerial).orElse(false)) {
253                    pending.lock.remove();
254                    // pending will be removed from pendingGest by
255                    // waiting thread, see updatePassword
256                    continue;
257                }
258            }
259        }
260    }
261
262    /**
263     * The Class PendingGet.
264     */
265    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
266    private static class PendingGet {
267        public final GetDisplayPassword event;
268        public final long expectedSerial;
269        public final CompletionLock lock;
270
271        /**
272         * Instantiates a new pending get.
273         *
274         * @param event the event
275         * @param expectedSerial the expected serial
276         */
277        public PendingGet(GetDisplayPassword event, long expectedSerial,
278                CompletionLock lock) {
279            super();
280            this.event = event;
281            this.expectedSerial = expectedSerial;
282            this.lock = lock;
283        }
284    }
285}
